dcterms:description: The HASOC dataset is designed for the identification of hate speech and offensive content in Indo-European languages, specifically focusing on Hindi, English, and German. It includes multiple subtasks for classification of abusive language.
dcterms:title: HASOC (Hate Speech and Offensive Content Identification in Indo-European Languages)
